title: Font pairing Tall Films
content:
Kind of new to typophile, sorry if this is the wrong place to ask this question.

Looking for either a serif or a sans serif for body text to pair with Tall Films.
author: designdisposition

comments.content:
Does it have to be free?

hhp

Maybe the request would be better suited for the Design section.  
Then some specifics about the work would help.
